## FormSchema type

Schema structure for defining forms inside AForm

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormSchema = BaseSchema & {
    align?: string;
    edit?: boolean;
    fieldtype?: string;
    label?: string;
    name?: string;
    width?: string;
    mask?: string;
};
```
